Article Text:

India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: Pulwama cricketer wears helmet with Palestinian flag sticker; cops start probe
Article Text:
J&K cricketer wears helmet with Palestine flag

JAMMU/SRINAGAR: J&K police have started a probe after videos went viral of a cricketer, Furqan Ul Haq, walking into a Jammu tournament wearing a Palestinian flag sticker on his helmet. The row also took on a political edge, with the PDP and others backing the Pulwama youth and BJP condemning the act as an attempt to incite ‚Äúseparatism‚Äù.The controversy broke Wednesday after Furqan strode in to bat at Jammu and Kashmir Champions League in Muthi, around 10km from Jammu city, for his team JK Eleven Kings with the flag emblazoned on his helmet. Some players of the rival team Jammu Trail Blazers raised strong objections, leading Furqan‚Äôs team to send him back and oust him from the match.On Friday, the police issued a statement confirming a preliminary inquiry to ‚Äúascertain the facts‚Äù Furqan‚Äôs ‚Äúintent, background and any possible linkages‚Äù. The 14-day preliminary inquiry under Section 173(3) BNSS has been ordered given the sensitivity of the matter and its potential public order implications, the statement added. Furqan and the private organisers of the tournament were later called to Jammu‚Äôs Domana police station for the inquiry.Jammu and Kashmir Cricket Association (JKCA) distanced itself from the controversy, maintaining that the tournament was a private event and not recognised by it. ‚ÄúJKCA has nothing to do with this. It involves local players. Even spectators are not allowed. Police will take necessary action,‚Äù JKCA official Anil Gupta said.While JKCA shrugged off the issue, politicians didn‚Äôt. Former CM and PDP president Mehbooba Mufti posted a message in support of Palestine. ‚ÄúFrom the river to the sea, Palestine will be free. A flag in the wind, bold and free, From the river to the sea,‚Äù Mehbooba wrote on X after reports about the police inquiry.Sheikh Khursheed, Awami Ittehad Party MLA and brother of jailed Baramulla MP Engineer Rashid, called the police action ‚Äúunjustified.‚Äù Khursheed said expressing solidarity with Palestine should not be treated as a crime, particularly when India has consistently supported the Palestinian cause internationally.Khursheed recalled that Congress‚Äôs Priyanka Gandhi had carried a bag bearing a Palestine symbol in Parliament without facing action. ‚ÄúIf such expressions are acceptable for politicians, targeting a sportsperson for a symbolic gesture exposes selective outrage,‚Äù Khursheed said.BJP, however, denounced Furqan. Party MLA RS Pathania called for strict action against the cricketer and the organisers of the match, saying such deeds ‚Äúemanating from Kashmir only promotes separatism‚Äù.This is the second cricket event in J&K to have been engulfed by controversy in less than two months. In Nov last year, the privately run Indian Heaven Premier League (IHPL) collapsed when its organisers allegedly bolted out of Srinagar after duping players, officials, broadcasters and hoteliers.
Article Summary: J&k police have started a probe after videos went viral of a cricketer wearing a palestinian flag sticker on his helmet. The row also took on a political edge, with the pdp and others backing the pulwama youth and bjp condemning the act as an attempt to incite ‚Äúseparatism‚Äù

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into dollars

Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‚ÄòMad Max‚Äô, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of 2025, Max Scherzer and his wife, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets.The right-handed player who is currently a free agent, mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings. In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season.Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of MLB.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max‚Äôs wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan‚Äôs combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: As of 2025, max scherzer and his wife, erica may-scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. The couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. Together, the scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.

Article Title: Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025: Inside their boxing earnings, Olympic career, love story, and business deals
Article Text:
Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025: Inside their boxing earnings, Olympic career, love story, and business deals (Image via Getty)

Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam combined net worth in 2025

Jake Paul boxing earnings and business investments

Jutta Leerdam Olympic career and sponsorship income



Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam relationship update





Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam are one of the most talked-about sports couples right now. Fans follow their careers, their money, and their relationship closely. Together, they have built huge success in two very different sports. Jake earns from boxing and business deals. Jutta earns from Olympic-level speed skating and brand work. Their combined wealth keeps growing as both stay active in their careers.Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam's combined net worth is estimated at roughly $205 million in 2025.Jake Paul's net worth is said at about $200 million. Most of his money comes from business ventures, pay-per-view sales, and boxing events. Jutta Leerdam's net worth is estimated at about $5 million gained from skating profits, prize money, and sponsorships.Jake Paul began boxing full-time in 2018. Since then, he has become one of the highest-earning names in crossover boxing.Jake Paul's fight with Mike Tyson in 2024 and his rematch with Anthony Joshua in 2025 earned millions in pay-per-view subscriptions and ticket sales. The fight against Mike Tyson sold out all of the seats in both Las Vegas and New York City, which produced a huge increase in revenues through the sales of pay-per-view and event tickets.In addition to being an accomplished fighter, Jake Paul runs Most Valuable Promotions, a boxing promotion company, and has also invested in several different gaming and sports investments.Jake Paul earns money from sponsorships, media endeavors, and investment properties. Boxing is only one source of income for Jake Paul.Jutta Leerdam is one of the top speed skaters in the world. She won Olympic silver at the 2022 Winter Olympics in skating sport and has multiple world titles in sprint events.Her income comes from race winnings, skating contracts, and brand deals. She has worked with major fashion and tech brands, along with social media partnerships. These deals make up a large part of her yearly earnings.Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam made their relationship public in April 2023. Since then, they have been seen supporting each other at fights and skating events.Jake Paul had a noteworthy boxing match in 2025 with boxer Anthony Joshua, but her fiance Jutta Leerdam is still preparing for international skating events leading up to the following Olympic cycle.Early 2025 finds both of them prioritizing their careers. They often attend various major public events together.Also Read: Anthony Joshua Net Worth In 2025: Inside His Boxing Earnings, Career, And Payday Before Jake Paul Fight
Article Summary: Jake paul and jutta leerdam are one of the most talked-about sports couples. They have built huge success in two very different sports. Jake earns from boxing and business deals. Jutna earns from olympic-level speed skating and brand work. Their combined wealth keeps growing as both stay active in their careers.

Article Title: Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd combined net worth: WWE careers, bonuses, salaries, contracts, and overall earnings
Article Text:
Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd (Image Source: Getty)

Natalya Neidhart‚Äôs WWE career and earnings growth

Tyson Kidd‚Äôs in-ring success and post-injury WWE role





Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd were born into professional wrestling and WWE universe and have been established since they were 20 years old. Through WWE contracts, television showcases, and decades of steady employment instead of fleeting headlines, both built financial futures. Good record of relevancy, including expanding their combined net worth.Neither is among WWE's top 10 global superstars so far as compensation, at least on the finer points of the evening, but the dollars tell the tale of consistent success for each. Natalya is still appearing regularly, while Tyson Kidd moved into an important backstage position after suffering a career-ending injury. Combined, their earnings have been accumulated with salaries, achievement bonuses, merchandise royalties, and offstage duties not associated with actual wrestling.Natalya Neidhart has had one of the longest, uninterrupted runs in WWE's modern era women's division. Having first debuted on the main roster in the late 2000s, she quickly became a consistent presence on weekly television, premium live events, and overseas excursions. This consistency eventually progressed into an uptick in contract renewals and a small bump in pay every year.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The bulk of Natalya's income has traditionally come from a salary she is guaranteed to earn annually, bonuses related to major events, merchandise, and further exposure via WWE-related media. The association with the iconic Hart wrestling family only enhanced her brand value, allowing her to remain relevant throughout almost every era of women's wrestling. Her individual net worth has widely been estimated at around $2 million, a figure based on years of reliable earnings, not temporary highs.Tyson Kidd‚Äôs real-life identity is TJ Wilson. He started his career working as an in-ring performer, predominantly as a skilled singles male and tag team wrestler. However, a serious neck injury in 2015 saw his career take a drastic turn when he was forced to stop competing full-time.Instead of releasing him, WWE kept Kidd backstage in a producer and trainer role. It's a role that hardly anyone but hardcore fans will notice, but guarantees employment, stability, and permanence in a company. His continued role in planning matches and developing talent has helped him secure an ongoing source of income, which is reported at $3 million.Combined, Natalya Neidhart and husband Tyson Kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. That number represents two decades' worth of WWE contracts, bonuses, royalties, and near-constant employment. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within WWE, the opposite of top-tier superstars, most of whom work based on huge short-term contracts.Also Read: What is really going on with WWE star Nikki Bella and NFL star Cooper DeJean‚Äôs dating buzz on Netflix?
Article Summary: Natalya neidhart and husband tyson kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. Their earnings have been accumulated with salaries, achievement bonuses, merchandise royalties, and offstage duties. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within wwe.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby‚Äôs lifestyle: Inside Pittsburgh Penguins captain‚Äôs luxury watch collection and personal style
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby of the Pittsburgh Penguins looks on against the Carolina Hurricanes (Credit: Getty Images)

Sidney Crosby of Pittsburgh Penguins luxury watch collection overview





The contribution of Sidney Crosby in the NHL cannot be overlooked. The 3 time Stanley Cup winner and two-time Olympic gold medalist has made history and won awards during his illustrious career. As fans cheer him up about his performance on the ice, off-ice activities display another side of the superstar; he is keen on details, style, and craftsmanship with his own luxury watches.The passion that Crosby shows towards watches is not just a hobby, but the love of design, functionality, and heritage. His well-managed time pieces, whether they are practical or a status symbol, are used during game days with the Pittsburgh Penguins or when he is being seen at a high-profile event. In the recent past, he had taken this interest further into business by investing in Swiss watchmaker Norqain, combining his interest in watches and business.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.His meticulous attention to detail is also pointed out in the watch line offered by Crosby. One of his most outstanding is the Wild ONE Skeleton 42mm Turquoise, which has been selected because of its lightweight and durable design, which best fits his active lifestyle.The skeletonized face and the bright turquoise highlights reflect the vigorous presence of Crosby on the ice. The other popular model is the Freedom 60 Chrono 43mm Black, which is sporty and yet has a chronograph feature and could be used at any casual or formal event.The Norqain watches were initially revealed to the Pittsburgh Penguins captain in 2019, at the NHL All-Star Game in San Jose, when he was given a timepiece as part of a set of All-Stars. It eventually gained him appreciation over the years to the extent that he decided to invest in the Swiss brand alongside his former teammate Mark Streit. This collaboration will enable Crosby to shape design and marketing with a wider audience, as well as spread his experience and enthusiasm to a wider audience.Crosby watches are not just a fashionable accessory, but they are a demonstration of his strict attitude to life and sport. From on-ice performance to entrepreneurial activities, every timepiece in his line reflects precision, strength, and sophistication. On the one hand, the collection of Crosby provides fans of both the NHL and horology a hint of the sophisticated preferences of one of the legendary figures in the history of hockey.Together, these watches underline Crosby‚Äôs enduring legacy, leadership, and refined taste beyond the hockey rink. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining Crosby‚Äôs leadership beyond hockey culture.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Pittsburgh penguins captain sidney crosby has his own luxury watch collection. He has invested in swiss watchmaker norqain, combining his interest in watches and business. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining his leadership beyond hockey culture.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark names her favorite NFL player on New Heights amidst Super Bowl buzz
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark (Image via Getty)

Caitlin Clark is a huge Drake Maye fan



Caitlin Clark‚Äôs most-awaited recovery and return







With the Super Bowl almost a month away, everyone has their favorites, and so does WNBA‚Äôs biggest star, Caitlin Clark. On the recent episode of the ‚ÄúNew Heights‚Äù podcast hosted by the Kelce brothers, Jason and Travis, the 2024 ROTY winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for Super Bowl 2026.Though Clark hails from Iowa, she admitted her admiration for the New England Patriots, which is largely influenced by her liking for Patriots star QB Drake Maye. This seemed like a classic case where greatness recognizes and appreciates greatness.The last episode of New Heights for 2025 was anything but not dramatic. In a conversation with Jason and Travis over who is Clark‚Äôs favorite to win the next Super Bowl, Caitlin revealed, ‚ÄúI may not be cheering for anybody‚Ä¶but honestly, I am a Drake Maye fan. He‚Äôs been incredible.Continuing, she said, ‚ÄúI will probably be pulling for the Patriots, but the Rams are really good too. Sam Darnold seems like a good guy‚Ä¶I could root for him.‚ÄùDrake Maye and Caitlin Clark began their professional career in 2024 and have been proving to be a cornerstone for their teams. Draye Maye registered a completion rate of 66.6% completing 225-of-338 passes in 2024, over 2,276 yards, and 15 touchdowns.Clark also entered the 2025 season after a historic rookie campaign where she averaged 19.2 points and a league-leading 8.4 assists per game. Though her 2025 season ended early, just after 13 games, due to an injury, the snippets from the USA camp show Clark is healthier and ready to enter the 2026 season with a bang.While the Super Bowl occupies the current headline from who‚Äôll play to who‚Äôll perform at halftime, the Indy fever fans are more concerned with Clark‚Äôs physical longevity.Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the WNBA‚Äôs 2026 tip-off. Clark‚Äôs return is just not crucial for the Fever, whose offensive strength revolves around her, but also for the league as she‚Äôs a walking viewership magnet. The fourth-most-watched WNBA games of 2025 all featured Caitlin Clark and her team. Now, that is some serious digital power flex.Also read: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery's combined net worth 2025: Exploring WNBA power couple‚Äôs career earnin
Article Summary: Caitlin clark is a huge drake maye fan. The 2024 roty winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for super bowl 2026. Clark hails from iowa, she admitted her admiration for the new england patriots, which is largely influenced by her liking for patriots star qb drake mayo.

Article Title: ‚ÄúBest year of my life‚Äù-Tyrese Haliburton calls 2025 a turning point as Indiana Pacers star shares quiet gratitude on Instagram
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton (Image via Getty)

Tyrese Haliburton reflects on life with a heart full of gratitude through an Instagram post





For Tyrese Haliburton, 2025 was a year of acceptance and patience. The Indiana Pacers cornerstone led the NBA franchise to unexpected heights but unfortunately faltered in the finals due to his torn ACL. His injury not only brought tears to his teammates but also the entire state of Indiana was heartbroken. Despite being off the basketball court, Tyrese Haliburton has been adding core memories to his life‚Äôs book.The NBA star is busy planning his wedding with his longtime girlfriend Jade Jones. Haliburton went down on his crutches and proposed to Jones on July 28, 2025. Recently, the Pacers‚Äô star posted a slew of pictures and reflected on life with a heartfelt gratitude post on Instagram.The Indiana Pacers‚Äô icon Tyrese Haliburton looked back on his life and NBA journey with a gratitude-filled post on Instagram. The basketball star posted a slew of pictures dating from the finals against the Oklahoma City Thunder to proposing to his longtime girlfriend, Jade Jones. The post mentioned,‚Äú2025 was best year of my life. Thankful for all of y‚Äôall who made it special. Through all the highs, the lows, and everything in between! Looking forward to another year of growth. God is AmazingüôèüèΩ‚ÄùDespite being away from stadium lights, Tyrese Haliburton and his fiancee have kept their fans hooked to their social media feeds.The couple keep their fans updated about their day-to-day activities as well as the preparations for their big day.After being together for more than five years, both Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones got engaged in 2025. Their relationship dates back to 2019, when they both attended Iowa State University, where he played basketball and Jones was a cheerleader for the team. In an era of breakups and divorces, Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones have set a great standard with respect to their relationship, which totally depends upon love, understanding, and mutual respect.Also Read: 17-time WWE Champion John Cena sends 3-word inspiring message to Tyrese Haliburton as Pacers guard aims big NBA return

Article Title: Lamar Jackson shrugs off criticism as Ravens‚Äô playoff hopes hang in balance
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Criticism resurfaces at the worst possible time

Lamar Jackson: 'I'm Gonna Be Out There' | Baltimore Ravens

Lamar Jackson addresses the allegations directly

Also Read:





As the Baltimore Ravens head into a crucial Week 18 showdown, Lamar Jackson finds himself battling more than just a division rival. The two-time NFL MVP is also pushing back against renewed criticism about his professionalism, choosing calm defiance over distraction as Baltimore‚Äôs playoff fate hangs in the balance.Jackson recently became the subject of a pointed column that questioned his work ethic, alleging late-night video game habits and even suggesting he had fallen asleep during team meetings. The criticism went further, urging the Ravens to consider trading their franchise quarterback claims that quickly gained traction given Baltimore‚Äôs uneven 2025 campaign.Speaking to reporters this week, Jackson dismissed the narrative without hesitation. He labeled the criticism as ‚Äúnoise,‚Äù stressing that speculation tends to surface whenever results don‚Äôt go as planned.‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre winning, there‚Äôs no talk,‚Äù Jackson said. ‚ÄúAs soon as things don‚Äôt look right, all types of stuff comes out of nowhere.‚ÄùJackson was visibly amused by the suggestion that he had dozed off during meetings, flatly denying the claim and pointing to his relationship with head coach John Harbaugh as proof.‚ÄúDo you really think Coach Harbaugh would let me fall asleep in meetings?‚Äù Jackson said with a laugh. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sitting right in the front.‚ÄùHe also rejected reports about staying up late gaming, calling them completely fabricated and insisting they don‚Äôt reflect his routine even during the offseason. For Jackson, the focus remains on football, not on countering every headline.The timing of the criticism couldn‚Äôt be more sensitive. Jackson is expected to return this week after missing the Ravens‚Äô Week 17 win due to a painful back injury. With the AFC North title still up for grabs, Baltimore controls its playoff destiny with a win against the Pittsburgh Steelers.Despite missing time, Jackson made it clear he had nothing to apologize for regarding his injury absence. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm human,‚Äù he said, noting that the team still found a way to win without him. There‚Äôs a familiar rhythm to the doubts surrounding Jackson. From early career debates about his position to recurring questions about leadership and preparation, the quarterback has consistently responded with results. Now, with his contract future and postseason hopes intersecting, Jackson appears unfazed.As Sunday approaches, the Ravens will look to their star quarterback to silence both rivals and critics. If Baltimore‚Äôs playoff hopes survive, Jackson‚Äôs response won‚Äôt come through words; it will come under the lights, where he has made a habit of rewriting the conversation.
Article Summary: Lamar jackson is the subject of renewed criticism about his professionalism. The baltimore ravens head into a crucial week 18 showdown against the pittsburgh steelers. Jackson is expected to return this week after missing the ravens‚Äô week 17 win due to a painful back injury.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI was trying to call my husband‚Äù: Kobe Bryant‚Äôs wife Vanessa Bryant opens up about the pain she felt immediately after learning of his and Gianna Bryant‚Äôs deaths

Article Title: LeBron James vs Stephen Curry net worth: Total earnings, salary, and more
Article Text:
LeBron James and Stephen Curry (Image via Getty)

LeBron James vs Stephen Curry salary breakdown

The net worth battle between LeBron James and Stephen Curry







LeBron James and Stephen Curry are the Mount Rushmore of modern NBA. They just do not dominate the court with their skills and game IQ, but make a significant impact off the court too. It is still wild to imagine how James and Curry were born in the same hospital. Shocked much? As reported by the Beacon Journal in 2015, both James (1984) and Curry (1988) were born at Akron General Medical Center in Ohio, just a few years apart.These two heavyweights just don‚Äôt outshine their opponents on the court, but they also command the financial landscape of NBA. From battling for rings to sharing a bond of trust and respect, LeBron James and Stephen Curry have come a long way and have done their bank account. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen.If one just looks at the seasonal paycheck, then Stephen Curry is actually winning. For the 2025‚Äì26 season, Steph is pulling in a staggering $59.6 million from the Golden State Warriors, making him the highest-paid player in the league, a record that he has held since 2017-18. But LeBron James isn't exactly lagging, despite his Lakers salary for this season sitting at $52.6 million.The difference is Curry‚Äôs art of the "Supermax." He was the first player to cross the $200 million contract threshold when he signed a 5-year $201 million deal with the Warriors in 2017. And with his recent veteran extension of $62 million for 1-year, Curry‚Äôs on his way to becoming the first NBA player to be paid $62 million for a single season in 2026-27. However, while Steph wins the annual salary race, LeBron still leads in total career on-court earnings, having banked over $580 million since he was drafted back in 2003.This is where the comparison gets steep and the difference wide. LeBron James officially hit billionaire status in 2022 and currently sits at a net worth of approximately $1.3 billion. He didn't get there just by playing ball; he built an empire. Between his lifetime Nike deal (rumored to be worth over $1 billion), his production company SpringHill, and stakes in Fenway Sports Group (which owns the Red Sox and Liverpool FC), LeBron is playing a completely different game off the court.Stephen Curry‚Äôs current net worth is estimated at $240 million as of late 2025. While that‚Äôs a massive fortune, it shows the difference between being a superstar and being a tycoon. Steph‚Äôs wealth is climbing fast, though, thanks to his own Curry Brand, which is now independent after breaking with Under Armour and his Unanimous Media production house. At the end of the day, whether you prefer the King‚Äôs power or the Chef‚Äôs range, both are proving that the modern athlete is just as much a CEO as they are a point guard.Also read: "‚ÄúWe emptied the cups‚Äù: LeBron James and Bronny James get candid on LA Lakers‚Äô Spill The Tea
Article Summary: Lebron james and stephen curry are the mount rushmore of modern nba. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen. For the 2025‚Äì26 season, steph is pulling in a staggering $59.6 million from the golden state warriors.

Article Title: Tyrese Haliburton's fianc√©e Jade Jones reveals major wedding update, hinting at 2026 celebration
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones. Image via: Getty Images

Jade Jones sparks wedding buzz with 2026 marriage reveal

Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones‚Äô relationship timeline





While all the other basketball players and their families are busy entertaining at the New Year party, things at the Haliburtons‚Äô have started taking a new turn. Celebration took a different style at Jade Jones‚Äô house, as the Pacers star‚Äôs girlfriend revealed their wedding year, which was anticipated months back in 2025. While showing off her engagement ring, she decided to post a beautiful picture of herself, taking a mirror selfie, while announcing the year she is getting married.The Indiana Pacers‚Äô star, Tyrese Haliburton, proposed to his now-fianc√©e, Jade Jones, back in the month of July. While it was quite the romantic setup, and Haliburton bent down on one knee to ask her if she wanted to marry him, their marriage date was never confirmed until now. Let us dive deep into Jade Jones and Tyrese Haliburton's relationship status and their probable wedding date.In a recent series of events, Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs fianc√©e, Jade Jones, blasted the minds of her fans and the media by announcing the year when she is going to get hitched to the Indiana Pacers‚Äô star. Yes, that‚Äôs right, fasten your seatbelts and get ready to hear all the wedding bells; your favorite NBA couple is going to tie knots in 2026, and Jade Jones confirmed it via her Instagram story.She captioned her post by saying, ‚Äú2026 the year I become a wifeyyyyüë∞‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚Äù.Haliburton and Jones met back in 2019 at Iowa State University. At that time, Haliburton was a college basketball player, and Jones was a part of the cheerleading team. While their relationship started during the summer of 2019, their bond became prominent after the rise of the Pacers‚Äô star in the big league. Jones used to often cheer for him outside the court.The Indiana Pacers star, Tyrese Haliburton, began dating Jade Jones in 2019. In 2020-2021, they adopted a dog, Ames, naming it after the city where they first met. In 2022, Jones supported Haliburton and was there with him throughout his Rookie season. Not only that, in 2024, Jones travelled to Paris to support Haliburton at the Olympics, where Team USA won gold.In July 2025, Haliburton proposed to Jade Jones at Iowa State University, recreating the very first place where they met and fell in love for the first time. In that very same year, Jones hosted a bridesmaid getaway party, signaling her upcoming wedding, which is now confirmed to take place in 2026.Also read: ‚ÄúBest year of my life‚Äù-Tyrese Haliburton calls 2025 a turning point as Indiana Pacers star shares quiet gratitude on Instagram
Article Summary: The indiana pacers‚Äô star, tyrese haliburton, proposed to his now-fianc√©e, jade jones, back in july 2025. In that very same year, jones hosted a bridesmaid getaway party, signaling her upcoming wedding, which is now confirmed to take place in 2026.

Article Text:
Nikola Jokic injury update (Image via NBA)

Nikola Jokic will not play tonight

Nikola Jokic‚Äôs status against Cleveland Cavaliers (January 2, 2026)

What happened to Nikola Jokic‚Äôs knee

Denver Nuggets injury report vs Cavaliers (January 2, 2026)

Key injury notes for tonight

How the game changes without Jokic





when the Denver Nuggets face the Cleveland Cavaliers on January 2, 2026. Denver has ruled out its starting center as he continues to recover from a left knee hyperextension, an injury the team expects will keep him out for at least four weeks.This game was expected to be one of the more notable matchups of the week. Instead, it arrives with Denver missing much of its regular rotation and focused on getting through the night without further issues. The Nuggets are deep into an Eastern Conference road trip and are clearly thinking beyond a single January game.The Denver Nuggets confirmed earlier in the day that Nikola Jokic will not suit up in Cleveland. His absence is part of a planned recovery process, not a late decision or short-term rest.The game tips off at 7:30 p.m. ET at Rocket Arena, which means fans in India will be watching early on January 3. There has been no indication from the team that a return was ever on the table for this matchup.Nikola Jokic suffered a hyperextension of his left knee earlier in the week, with additional concern around a bone bruise. Denver has already outlined a recovery window of more than four weeks, with a re-evaluation expected in about a month.Before the injury, he was averaging 29.6 points, 12.2 rebounds, and 11 assists per game. His absence has already affected Denver‚Äôs short-term outlook and could play a role in how the MVP race unfolds this season.Jokic is only one of several Nuggets unavailable tonight. Denver‚Äôs injury report is one of the longest it has carried all season, especially in the frontcourt.Jamal Murray is listed with an ankle sprain but is expected to play, which would leave him as the clear focal point of Denver‚Äôs offense.Without Jokic, Denver Nuggets loses its main scorer, rebounder, and playmaker. The offense becomes more guard-driven, with fewer easy looks created through the center position.Also read: Denver Nuggets vs Cleveland Cavaliers regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, where to watch, and more (January 2, 2025) Cleveland enters with a healthier lineup and a clear advantage inside. For the Cavaliers, this is a game they are expected to control. For the Denver Nuggets, it is about staying competitive and getting through the night as they wait for their MVP to return later in the month.
Article Summary: Nikola jokic will not play for the denver nuggets against the cleveland cavaliers on january 2, 2026. The center suffered a hyperextension of his left knee earlier in the week. Denver has already outlined a recovery window of more than four weeks, with a re-evaluation expected in about a month.

Article Title: After T20 World Cup snub, Shubman Gill returns to domestic cricket ‚Äî but you can‚Äôt watch him: Here's why
Article Text:
Shubman Gill (PTI Photo/Ravi Choudhary

Inside story of why Shubman Gill was DROPPED from India T20I World Cup squad





Just like Virat Kohli ‚Äôs recent domestic matches, Indian ODI and Test captain Shubman Gill ‚Äôs upcoming Vijay Hazare Trophy game will also be played without fans in the stands. It will be Gill's first domestic game since being dropped from India's T20 World Cup squad.Gill will turn out for Punjab against Sikkim on Saturday at the Jaipuria College ground, but no general public will be allowed to watch the match from inside the venue.The decision has been taken following BCCI guidelines.According to the board‚Äôs instructions, both Shubman Gill and India pacer Arshdeep Singh will feature in Punjab‚Äôs next two Vijay Hazare Trophy matches.Punjab will face Sikkim on January 3 and Goa on January 6.While the match against Goa will be played at the KL Saini Stadium, the Sikkim game has been scheduled at the Jaipuria College ground.Due to security concerns and the absence of proper seating arrangements for spectators, the match will be held behind closed doors.A BCCI source explained that only people associated with the college will be allowed entry."The students and staff are allowed inside the premises but there will be enough security arrangements including private bouncers being deployed. In any case, no outsiders will be allowed inside the college premises," the source told PTI."The scheduling was done much earlier. Only because of Rohit Sharma and anticipating the response, Mumbai's match had to be shifted to Sawai Man Singh Stadium from Anantam," the source added.Like the Vijay Hazare Trophy games featuring Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, Gill‚Äôs match will also not be available for fans to watch on television or online.There will be no live broadcast or live streaming of the game.Shubman Gill and Arshdeep Singh are expected to reach the venue late on Friday night.Their travel plans were affected due to poor weather conditions in north India."Both Gill and Arshdeep were supposed to arrive by evening but prevailing weather condition in North India has led to delay of their flights. Weather permitting, they will arrive by late night," the source said.With fans unable to attend or watch the match live, Gill‚Äôs appearance for Punjab will remain a low-key affair.However, the game will still be important for Punjab as they continue their Vijay Hazare Trophy campaign with two key international players returning to domestic cricket.
Article Summary: Shubman gill will play for punjab against sikkim on saturday. No general public will be allowed to watch the match from inside the venue. It will be gill's first domestic game since being dropped from india's t20 world cup squad.

Article Title: Shubman Gill to play behind closed doors in Vijay Hazare Trophy
Article Text:
India's Shubman Gill (PTI Photo/Ravi Choudhary)

Why Mohammed Shami needs to return in India colours before World Cup





Jaipur: After a difficult few weeks ‚Äî first dealing with an injury setback and then the disappointment of being dropped from India‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad ‚Äî Shubman Gill will get a chance to rediscover his white-ball rhythm when the India‚Äôs Test and ODI skipper turns out for Punjab against Sikkim in the fifth round of the Vijay Hazare Trophy on Saturday.Much to the disappointment of Gill fans, the match will be played behind closed doors at the Jaipuria Vidyalaya ground, which doesn‚Äôt have the seating capacity of the Sawai Mansingh Stadium, where around 20,000 spectators enjoyed Rohit Sharma ‚Äôs ton last week.Gill, who will miss his Punjab opening partner Abhishek Sharma ‚Äî the dashing southpaw returned home following the first two games ‚Äî will look to make the most of these two Vijay Hazare matches to put the recent disappointment behind him. Besides Gill, left-arm speedster Arshdeep Singh will also play for Punjab in the next couple of matches.
Article Summary: India's test and odi skipper turns out for punjab against sikkim. The match will be played behind closed doors at the jaipuria vidyalaya ground. Gill will look to make the most of these two vijay hazare matches to put the recent disappointment behind him.

Article Title: IND vs NZ: Rishabh Pant at the heart of a fierce selection debate
Article Text:
Rishabh Pant (PTI Photo/Shailendra Bhojak)

Why Mohammed Shami needs to return in India colours before World Cup





New Delhi: The current Indian team management‚Äôs go-to word has been ‚Äòflexibility‚Äô. Now, it remains to be seen whether the selectors continue to experiment or opt for continuity. At the centre of this debate is Rishabh Pant By standard team-building logic, Pant‚Äôs place in the 15-member squad shouldn‚Äôt be in doubt. He has warmed the bench as KL Rahul ‚Äôs backup wicketkeeper for the last 18 months. Since coming back from a car accident, he has played only one ODI ‚Äî on a rank turner in Sri Lanka in Aug 2024. Before the accident, Pant averaged over 41 with a strike rate close to 110 while batting at No. 4. Much has changed since. Gautam Gambhir has consolidated his influence as head coach. Rohit Sharma has been replaced by Shubman Gill as captain. ‚ÄòFlexibility‚Äô and an aversion to superstar culture have become core principles of selection.Three ODIs against New Zealand may not seem significant. But India will play only 20 or so ODIs before the 2027 World Cup. ‚ÄúThe team management and selection committee did a good job when they started the transition process. But constant chopping and changing doesn‚Äôt help stability. If Pant has been your No. 2 wicketkeeper and is dropped without playing, you are challenging your own selection process. There needs to be consistency in selection, otherwise it doesn‚Äôt send a good signal to players coming up the ranks,‚Äù former national selector Devang Gandhi told TOI.It is understood that the selectors wanted to rotate Pant and Rahul as wicketkeepers in the six home ODIs this season. However, the continued reluctance to play Pant suggests a lack of trust in his abilities. Similar situations have played out in Test cricket with Shardul Thakur and Nitish Kumar Reddy, when the management and captain did not appear to be on the same page.‚ÄúMy only fear is a repeat of 2019, when you didn‚Äôt prepare backups in the middle order. Pant can still serve for another seven to eight years. If they feel they can maximise his potential, they must start working with him. He has been part of the system since 2018. If not, they must identify a definite second wicketkeeper ‚Äî and not keep changing without giving the player a full run, because there aren‚Äôt many ODIs before the World Cup,‚Äù former India wicketkeeper and broadcaster Deep Dasgupta said.Pant hasn‚Äôt set the stage on fire in the Vijay Hazare Trophy on sticky Bengaluru pitches. ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt judge him by the runs. He hasn‚Äôt played the 50-over format for nearly three-and-a-half years. Before his accident, he had started finding his feet in ODIs. It‚Äôs about how much you want to back him,‚Äù Dasgupta added.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant has warmed the bench as kl rahul‚Äôs backup wicketkeeper for the last 18 months. Pant averaged over 41 with a strike rate close to 110 while batting at no. 4. Pant hasn‚Äôt set the stage on fire in the vijay hazare trophy on sticky bengaluru pitches.

Article Title: 'Bowlers are an adaptable species': Ian Bishop on imbalance between bat and ball in T20s
Article Text:
Former West Indies cricketer Ian Bishop talks to media in Sharjah during ILT20's Qualifier 2

Sharjah:

Naseem Shah interview: Pakistan bowler opens up on bouts with injuries and tough recovery

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Batters have always been seen as the heroes and bowlers the villains. Even when I was playing that was always the battle Ian Bishop

Year Total Runs (T20s) Average Runs per Team 2025 4,62,258 295.37 2024 4,74,631 285.40 2023 3,49,643 288.00 2022 3,86,865 280.54 2021 3,49,170 281.81 2020 1,80,197 296.86

Poll Do you believe that the rise in T20 scores is improving the excitement of the game? Absolutely! It's thrilling. Somewhat. It depends on the match. Not really. I prefer lower scores. I have no opinion on this.





The number of runs cricketers score in the T20 cricket continues to climb each year since the turn of the decade. In 2025, 4,62,258 runs were scored across the world in game's shortest format. On an average, each team scored 295.37 runs per match.Punjab scored 310 against Bengal in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy with Abhishek Sharma scoring a 52-ball 148. At the international level, England walloped South Africa by scoring 304 runs, thanks to Phil Salt's unbeaten 60-ball 141 and Jos Buttler's 30-ball 83.Big scores remain the central objective for everyone involved - curators with batting-friendly pitches; lawmakers allowing broader bats and organisers promising run fest to bring fans to the stadiums or keep them hooked to the TV.The average score in the T20 format in the past five years reads: 281.81 (2021), 280.54 (2022), 288.00 (2023), 285.40 (2024) and 295.37 (2025). The year the first T20I was played (2005), the average was 275.19.Given the adulation they get, does that make a batter more attractive to the next generation of cricketers? Former West Indies speedster Ian Bishop doesn't think so."I don't think everybody wants to be a batter. I still think there is room in the game for those who want to bowl fast, those who want to bowl wrist spin, those who want to bowl finger spin," said Bishop, who is a commentator in the ongoing ILT20."Historically, and we go back to the inception of the game, batters have always been seen as the heroes and bowlers the villains. Even when I was playing that was always the battle," he continued to explain with a smile."I do think you are absolutely right in the respect that the game kind of has drifted more and more in favour of the batters but I still think guys want to come through. And bowlers are an adaptable species. The more the game changes, the more bowlers will come up with plans to counter it. That has always been the ebb and flow of cricket generally - red ball or white ball or T20."As administrators though, what I will agree with you on is that we have to do a better job of creating a better balance between bat and ball even in T20 cricket," he reasoned.This isn't the only radical change he wants to make to the modern game. The 58-year-old, who played 43 Test matches for the Windies, is a strong advocate for four-day Test matches."I have long been in favour of 4-day Test cricket. This is especially true if you are going to have a World Test Championship (WTC) where results are imperative, necessitating pitches that yield results."But the arguments against it from others is (about) weather impacting games and then there is no coming back. But if you ask me, I have long said publicly, I am a 4-day Test cricket fan.Here‚Äôs a rewritten version with the same meaning, but refreshed wording:The ICC had approved four-day Tests for bilateral series in 2017, with England facing Zimbabwe over four days at Trent Bridge last year, following four-day Tests against Ireland in 2019 and 2023. Four-day Tests have as yet not been played under the World Test Championship (WTC) format.Many smaller nations are hesitant to host Tests because of the time they require and the cost. However, shifting to four-day cricket could allow a full three-Test series to be completed in under three weeks. In four-day Tests, playing hours are extended to ensure a minimum of 98 overs per day (instead of 90) to help offset the time lost.
Article Summary: Former west indies cricketer ian bishop talks to media in sharjah during ilt20's qualifier 2. The number of runs cricketers score in the t20 cricket continues to climb each year since the turn of the decade. In 2025, 4,62,258 runs were scored across the world in game's shortest format.

Article Title: Kawhi Leonard NBA contract details: Total earnings, salary cap and more
Article Text:
Kawhi Leonard (Juan Ocampo / NBAE via Getty Images)

Kawhi Leonard‚Äôs contract breakdown



How Kawhi Leonard's contract hit Clippers‚Äô bench







After a spectacular season with Toronto Raptors in 2018-19, Kawhi Leonard decided to move closer to his house and signed with the LA Clippers. To make a championship worthy team, Leonard put forward the condition of acquiring another star player before signing, and the Clippers fulfilled it by getting Paul George in a blockbuster deal.With the league‚Äôs expansion, all eyes are always scanning the crowd for the next big trade, but Kawhi and the Clippers front office quietly handled their business back in early 2024 with a three-year, $149.5 million veteran extension. For all those die-hard fans of Leonard, this was a statement: Kawhi isn't going anywhere, and Steve Ballmer is more than willing to pay for that elite talent.Kawhi Leonard was drafted 15th overall by the Indiana Pacers in 2011 but was immediately traded to the San Antonio Spurs where he stayed till 2017-28 season. After joining the Raptors over a 1-year deal worth $23 million for 2018-19 season, Kawhi led the franchise to its first ever NBA championship and won his second Finals MVP.Since joining Clippers in 2019 on a 3-year $103 million contract that was active till 2021, the management and Leonardo decided to sign another maximum extension worth $176 million that would keep the latter in the team through 2024 season.On January 14 2024, Clippers via a social media post announced that they have signed another contract extension with Kawhi Leonard.It is a 3-year contract worth $149.5 million keeping Leonardo with the Clipper through the 2027 season.Through this deal, Leonard is guaranteed to earn $149.5 million with an average annual salary of $49 million in 2024. For the 2025-26 season, he will earn $50 million and $50.3 million for 2026-27. By the time the 2026-27 season wraps up, his career on-court earnings will cross past the $425 million mark becoming one of the highest on-court earners in NBA.From a front-office perspective, Kawhi‚Äôs contract is a massive anchor on the salary cap. Carrying a $50 million cap hit for each of the next two seasons means the Clippers are essentially living in the luxury tax. Because he signed for slightly below his absolute maximum, it gave the team just enough breathing room to keep guys like James Harden around, but let‚Äôs be real, the NBA‚Äôs CBA is always breathing down everyone‚Äôs necks.There‚Äôs no player option on the back end of this deal, meaning Kawhi is committed through 2027. For the fans, that‚Äôs the best part. They don't have to worry about "opt-out" rumors every summer. All they hope is that Kawhi Leonard stays healthy and fit and continues to perform dominantly on the court.Also read: Here are the 5 tallest players in today‚Äôs NBA: Victor Wembanyama, Zach Edey, and more
Article Summary: Kawhi leonard signed a three-year, $149.5 million veteran extension with the la clippers in january 2024. The contract extension keeps leonard with the team through the 2027 season. Leonard was drafted 15th overall by the indiana pacers in 2011 but was immediately traded to the san antonio spurs.
